meanings.definition: The process of soaking food in a seasoned liquid before cooking.
meanings.sent1: Marination helps to add flavor to the meat before grilling.
meanings.sent2: I always let the chicken sit in marination overnight for the best taste.
meanings.sent3: The marination party in the fridge made the chicken very happy.
meanings.sent4: The marination of ideas in her mind led to a burst of creativity.
meanings.sent5: The marination of the steak in garlic and herbs was simply divine.

meanings.sent1: Proper marination is key to tenderizing the meat.
meanings.sent2: The chef's marination of the fish was impeccable.
meanings.sent3: The marination dance around the kitchen made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His marination of words in the speech captivated the audience.
meanings.sent5: The marination of the vegetables in the sauce made them irresistible.
